entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
